alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; McDonald; Newton; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 09 at 8:25AM CST until February 12 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Residual flooding from yesterdays heavy rainfall will continue into the afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Barry, Lawrence, McDonald, Newton and Stone. * WHEN...Until 430 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 825 AM CST, Residual flooding from yesterdays heavy rainfall will continue into the afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monett, Cassville, Pineville, Anderson, Pierce City, Goodman, Purdy, Exeter, Wheaton, Lanagan, Butterfield, Rocky Comfort, Ridgley, Wayne, Powell, Mcdowell, Pleasant Ridge, Madry, Jenkins, Wheelerville and Big Sugar Creek State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
